snippet: Dr. Mehmet Oz will question the credibility of critics who sought to have him removed from his position at Columbia in a segment on his show on Thursday, a spokesman for the show said.
abstract: Celebrity talk show host Dr Mehmet Oz plans to respond aggressively on The Dr Oz Show to letter sent by 10 physicians to Columbia University questioning Oz's position there as vice chairman of surgery department; letter criticized Oz's opposition to genetic engineering of food crops.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Mehmet Oz will question the credibility of critics who sought to have him removed from his position at Columbia in a segment on his show on Thursday, a spokesman for the show said.

headline.main: Dr. Oz to Respond on Show to Criticism by Physicians
headline.print_headline: Dr. Oz to Respond on Show to Criticism by Physicians
